Class Student

java.lang.Object
User
Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Student
extends User
Represent a Student that uses the MySTARS system application. A Student is an user, therefore it inherits the User class.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String username, int maxAU, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String matricNumber, java.lang.String email)
      Creates a Student with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of this Student. The full name should include first name and last name.
      username - The account username of this Student.
      maxAU - The maximum number of academic units that can be registered by this Student.
      gender - The gender of this Student.
      nationality - The nationality of this Student.
      matricNumber - The matriculation number of this Student.
      email - The email account of this Student.

  • Method Details

    • setNoOfAU

      public void setNoOfAU​(int AU)
      Method that increases the number of academic units registered by a Student.
      Parameters:
      AU - Number of academic units to be increased to the calling Student object.

      Method that gets the number of academic units register by a Student.

    • getWaitlist

      public java.util.ArrayList<Index> getWaitlist()
      Method that gets the list of registered indexes of a Student that are placed in waitlist.
      Returns:
      The list of registered indexes of the calling Student object that are placed in waitlist.

    • addReg

      public void addReg​(Index index)
      Method that adds an Index to the registered Index list of a Student. The number of registered academic units of a Student is increased at the end of the method.
      Parameters:
      index - The Index object to be added to the registered Index list of the calling Student object.

    • removeReg

      public void removeReg​(Index index)
      Method that removes an Index from the registered Index list of a Student. The number of registered academic units of a Student is decreased at the end of the method.
      Parameters:
      index - The Index object to be removed from the registered Index list of the calling Student object.

    • addWaitlist

      public void addWaitlist​(Index index)
      Method that adds an Index to the registered Index list in waitlist status of a Student.
      Parameters:
      index - The Index object to be added to the registered Index list with waitlist status of the calling Student object.

    • removeWaitlist

      public void removeWaitlist​(Index index)
      Method that removes an Index from the registered Index list in waitlist status of a Student.
      Parameters:
      index - The Index object to be removed from the registered Index list with waitlist status of the calling Student object.

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(Index index)
      Method that process the registration of an Index by a Student. The process is brought out by the RegistrationManager class and it is a lengthy legal process.
      Parameters:
      index - Index to be registered by the calling Student object.

    • dropIndex

      public void dropIndex​(Index index)
      Method that process the deregistration of an Index by a Student. The process is brought out by the RegistrationManager class and it is a lengthy legal process.
      Parameters:
      index - Index to be dropped by the calling Student object.

    • changeIndex

      public void changeIndex​(Index sourceInd, Index desInd)
      Method that process the change of Index by a Student. * The process is brought out by the RegistrationManager class and it is a lengthy legal process.
      Parameters:
      sourceInd - Index object to be changed by the calling Student object.
      desInd - Target Index object to be changed to by the calling Student object.

    • swapIndex

      public void swapIndex​(Index sourceInd, Index desInd, Student desID)
      Method that process the swap of Index by a Student with another Student. * * The process is brought out by the RegistrationManager class and it is a lengthy legal process.
      Parameters:
      sourceInd - Index object to be swapped by the calling Student object.
      desInd - Target Index object to be swapped by the calling Student object.
      desID - Target Student object to be swapped with by the calling Student object.

    • printTimetable

      public void printTimetable()
      Method that prints all the registered course timetable of a Student.
